Context:
Changes to LLC Laptop Loan Policy effective December 18, 2023:
- iPads can be borrowed for up to 7 days with two renewals (subject to availability)
- iPad pens are compatible and can be charged by being directly plugged into the iPad
- Wacom drawing tablets recommended for creative types
- LLC iPads come preloaded with specialized program content specific to classes taught at each campus location
- Contact information: 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, ask.george@georgebrown.ca
- Sign up for college news and updates on the website
- Visit the Computers & Software page for more information about technology equipment
- Land acknowledgment page available to learn more
- Contact George Brown College via social media through their Social Media Hub.

Note: The information contained in this website is subject to change without notice. It should not be viewed as a representation, offer or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
